pages.text: Players should venture into the Midnight once they've invested in a trait that grants access to the dimension. Practitioners of GRAYCE and BAWLS must eventually seek the resources of the Midnight to continue their progression.

Level 6 Midnight Biomes$(li)Black Ridge$(li)Crystal Spires$(li)Deceitful Bog$(li)Fungi Forest$(li)Hilly Fungi Forest$(li)Hilly Vigilant Forest$(li)Night Plains$(li)Obscured Peaks$(li)Obscured Plateau$(li)Phantasmal Valley$(li)Runebush Grove$(li)Vigilant Forest$(li)Warped Fields
